description.value:
This aeon stone must be activated to provide a benefit.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Effect You activate the aeon stone to gain the effects of a 1st-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Illusory Disguise].

The resonant power allows you to render all of your aeon stones and your wayfinder @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Invisible] whenever you use the activation to gain the effects of illusory disguise.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Pathfinder Society Guide
